page.title: 14Typical Industrial Scenery
page.content: On Wednesday afternoon Mr Goakes took a large group of us to see how many interesting things there were to see. Firstly, we saw a church called {St. Hilda's}and on the same lane there was a{Youth Training Hostel,}a take-away, a post office and a Skoda garage. Right at the end of the road was a pub. We went round a corner and there was a{hairdresser's,}a{chippy,}and a bit further down there was a{petrol {station. We crossed the{Green Bridge}and it brought us onto{Pontefract Lane. Across the street there was a big block of office suites. Further down, there was a{glass factory}and back on our side of the road there was a {spring factory}and two{tool dealers.
